ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok i have a question. how in the world are you all getting multi-thousands of platinum? I think the most ive ever owned is 2250pp at one time, and that was
ygData.messageBody:
Ok i have a question. how in the world are you all getting multi-thousands
of platinum?

I think the most ive ever owned is 2250pp at one time, and that was after a
LOT of saving...

-----Original Message-----
From: Quasinom de Plume [mailto:eqmailing@...]
Sent: Monday, November 27, 2000 11:21 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Skill Increases


Greetings:

Unfortunately you are experiencing normal skill growth for Rebreathers.
My skill is now 150 after attempting to make over 50 of them with max Int
of 212 and Dex of 115. (Not sure if dexterity plays a role in Tinkering -
would make sense as we are dealing with tiny mechanisms and a steady hand
is needed.)

Personaly I really hope they enhance the amount of skill increases for the
SoV tinkering fix. Right now it's costing me a little over 15k pp per
skill point. At the current rate it will cost me over 760k pp to reach
200 skill!!!!

/em shakes his head in disbelief

QdP
52 Gnomish Magi
Ilsik Haucil
Mith Marr

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"


--- "Dr. Boskonovitch" <boskonovitch113@...> wrote: > Hello,
>
> I was just wondering if anyone else is having the same problem I am.
> I'm stuck at 148 skill. I have attempted 55 rebreathers (and
> succeeded 39 times), but have not seen a single increase past 148.
>
> Thanks for any help you can give,
>
> Boskonovitch Svojinovick, Fennin Ro
> 32 Gnome Necromancer
> Master Tinkerer (148)
>
> Svojinovick VonLandingham, Fennin Ro
> 19 Gnome Warrior
> Master Fletcher (150)
>
